name: the granny plastic bag holder
sizes_available: 18" long x 7" wide when laid out flat
notes:
keep your plastic bags stored away in handmade style with your own crochet bag holder. the granny plastic bag holder uses the granny stitch in the round throughout the majority of this pattern, making it a great movie night pattern.

you can add bags into the top of the holder and pull them out of the bottom. 
the bag holder can be changed to fit the height that you would like by adjusting the amount of row repeats that you do.


> [subscribe to my newsletter][1] to be notified when new patterns come out

this pattern uses 245 yards of a medium-weight cotton yarn, but acrylic can be used too. 

a video tutorial is available: https://youtu.be/woqfujyotgc

materials:
245 yards of medium 4-weight cotton yarn
yarn used: loops & threads capri eco cotton 
5.50 mm crochet hook
yarn needle to weave in ends.
stitch markers
scissors
